casebody.data:

v.
KALVIG & LEDUC, P.C., Kalvig Law Firm, P.C., Bruce Frederickson, Angela LeDuc, and Lake County, a political subdivision, Defendants and Appellees. DA 17-0261 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: December 13, 2017
